text: Story highlights ` ` The Rock'' takes it on the chin with special Razzie for ` ` Baywatch'' He says the film was made with ` ` the best of intentions'' ( CNN ) It may not have been an Oscar, but Dwayne Johnson graciously accepted the award anyway. ` ` The Rock'' posted a video Sunday on Instagram accepting a Razzie for last year's ` ` Baywatch.'' The Golden Raspberry Awards, known as the Razzies, celebrate the best of the worst in Hollywood. Along with the video, the star wrote, ` ` So let me go ahead and take this ` ` L'' right on the chin for Baywatch. Win some, lose some, but hey... that's the way love goes.
